publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. Clark, for Joseph Watts ...,

notesStmt.note: Title of v. 2: Hibernia anglicana, or, The second part of the history of Ireland ... / by the author of the first part ... In the Savoy : Printed by Edward Jones, for Joseph Watts ..., Matthew Gillyflower ..., Charles Harper ... and Samuel Crouch, 1690.

Erratas: p. [4] at end of v. 1, p. 211 of v. 2.
